source:
%%sql

SELECT DISTINCT
    casenumber
    ,caseReference
    ,eventtype
    ,eventname
    ,eventstatus
    ,isurgent
    ,eventpublished
    ,eventstartdatetime
    ,eventenddatetime
    ,notificationofsitevist
    ,dateeventrequested
    ,actualduration
    ,eventaddressline1
    ,eventaddressline2
    ,eventaddresstown
    ,eventaddresscountry
    ,eventaddresspostcode
    ,"0" AS Migrated
    ,"Horizon" AS ODTSourceSystem
    ,Source.SourceSystemID AS SourceSystemID
    ,to_timestamp(Appeals_event.expected_from) AS ingestionDate
    ,NULL AS ValidTo
    ,md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(casenumber,'.')
            ,IFNULL(caseReference,'.')
            ,IFNULL(eventtype,'.')
            ,IFNULL(eventname,'.')
            ,IFNULL(eventstatus,'.')
            ,IFNULL(isurgent,'.')
            ,IFNULL(eventpublished,'.')
            ,IFNULL(eventstartdatetime,'.')
            ,IFNULL(eventenddatetime,'.')
            ,IFNULL(notificationofsitevist,'.')
            ,IFNULL(dateeventrequested,'.')
            ,IFNULL(actualduration,'.')
            ,IFNULL(eventaddressline1,'.')
            ,IFNULL(eventaddressline2,'.')
            ,IFNULL(eventaddresstown,'.')
            ,IFNULL(eventaddresscountry,'.')
            ,IFNULL(eventaddresspostcode,'.')
        )) AS RowID -- this hash should contain all the defining fields
    ,'Y' AS IsActive
FROM  
    odw_standardised_db.horizon_appeals_event AS Appeals_event
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact AS Source
        ON Source.Description = 'Casework'
        AND Source.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
    Appeals_event.Expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_appeals_event)

CASE
        WHEN T1.CaseReference IS NULL
        THEN T3.NSIPExaminationTimetableID
        ELSE NULL
    END                             AS NSIPExaminationTimetableID,
    T1.id                           AS ID,
    T1.casereference                AS CaseReference,
    T1.typeofexamination            AS TypeOfExamination,
    T1.name                         AS Name,
    T1.description                  AS Description,
    T1.deadlinestartdatetime        AS DeadlineStartDateTime,
    T1.date                         AS Date,
    T1.location                     AS Location,
    null                            AS EventLineItems,
    "0"                             AS Migrated,
    T3.Published                    AS Published,
    "Horizon"                       AS ODTSourceSystem,
    T2.SourceSystemID               AS SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)  AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                            AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(T1.id,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.casereference,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.typeofexamination,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.name,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.description,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.deadlinestartdatetime,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.date,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.location,'.')
        ))                          AS RowID, -- this hash should contain all the defining fields
    'Y'                             AS IsActive,
    T3.IsActive                     AS HistoricIsActive
